meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Kazakhstan.
meanings.sent1: In Kazakhstan, you can buy many things with just one tenge.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for some tenge at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The tenge in my pocket started a conversation with the coins.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were like a pile of colorful tenge, waiting to be spent.
meanings.sent5: The shiny tenge sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Kazakhstan.
meanings.sent1: The price of the item was listed in tenge on the menu.
meanings.sent2: She counted her tenge carefully before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The tenge in his wallet whispered secrets to the other bills.
meanings.sent4: The value of friendship cannot be measured in tenge.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together was music to her ears, especially the tenge.

meanings.sent1: When traveling to Kazakhstan, make sure to have some tenge with you.
meanings.sent2: The tenge is used for all transactions in the country.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous tenge rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were filled with images of mountains of tenge.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly printed tenge notes filled the air in the bank.
